x_nuta2_nutanix_ca_nutanix_marketplaceit.author: Nutanix
x_nuta2_nutanix_ca_nutanix_marketplaceit.description:
Greylog is built to open standards, Graylog’s connectivity and interoperability seamlessly collects, enhances, stores, and analyzes log data. Easily create custom dashboards to visualize a variety of metrics and trends on a single page. Analyze data and find issues quickly with the ability to explore multiple attack vectors at once. Prevent data loss with the Graylog message journal in case of a network outage. Use the Graylog Sidecar to manage flexible and stackable configurations for all log collectors, both Graylog and third-party, from one central interface.

License:
  • General Public License v3.0
Hardware Requirement:
  • By default 2vCPU, 4 GB RAM.
Resources Installed:
  • MongoDB
  • Elasticsearch
  • GrayLog
Operating System:
  • CentOS Linux release 7.7.2003
  • Select the AMI according to the region on AWS.
  • Select the Image according to the zone on GCP.
  • Select the Image according to the location on Azure.
Platform:
  • AHV
  • AWS
  • GCP
  • Azure
  • VMware
Lifecycle:
  • NA
Limitations:
  • Single VM GrayLog Instance. HA not available.
  • Not recommended for the production use.
Other Instructions:
  • Open port 80 and 9000 under Firewall/Security group.

Easily create custom dashboards to visualize a variety of metrics and trends on a single page. Analyze data and find issues quickly with the ability to explore multiple attack vectors at once. Prevent data loss with the Graylog message journal in case of a network outage. Use the Graylog Sidecar to manage flexible and stackable configurations for all log collectors, both Graylog and third-party, from one central interface. #### License: * General Public License v3.0 #### Hardware Requirement: * By default 2vCPU, 4 GB RAM. #### Resources Installed: * MongoDB * Elasticsearch * GrayLog #### Operating System: * CentOS Linux release 7.7.2003 * Select the [AMI](https://goo.gl/td2eJJ) according to the region on AWS. * Select the [Image](https://goo.gl/51oD7D) according to the zone on GCP. * Select the [Image](https://bit.ly/3c7sr9i) according to the location on Azure. #### Platform: * AHV * AWS * GCP * Azure * VMware #### Lifecycle: * NA #### Limitations: * Single VM GrayLog Instance. HA not available. * Not recommended for the production use. #### Other Instructions: * Open port 80 and 9000 under Firewall/Security group.
